# FWP Image Gallery - llms.txt

> FWP Image Gallery is a curated collection of images organized by categories and tags, with AI-powered metadata generation for SEO optimization.

## Overview

This is an image gallery website featuring:
- High-quality images across multiple categories (Nature, Technology, Art, Travel, People, Animals, Food, Abstract)
- AI-generated metadata including titles, descriptions, and tags
- User features: favorites, comments, profiles
- Trending content based on popularity metrics

## Content Structure

- /gallery - Browse all published images
- /trending - View trending images by time period
- /category/{name} - Browse images by category
- /tag/{name} - Browse images by tag
- /image/{slug} - View individual image with metadata
- /search - Search images by keywords

## API Endpoints

Public JSON API available at:
- GET /api/images - List images with pagination
- GET /api/images/{slug} - Get single image details
- GET /api/search?q={query} - Search images

## Sitemaps

- /sitemap.xml - Main sitemap
- /sitemap-images.xml - Image sitemap with image metadata

## Contact

For inquiries about content licensing or API access, please contact the site administrator.
